name: Luna Encantada Vacation Condos

reviews.text: I spent in condo f2 five nights - we were 2 couples + 1 baby. First time for me and my wife. The place is definitely nice and the location is excellent. The condo is well and adequately furnished.It must be noted that there was no noise problem as someone complained.
reviews.title: Luna Encantada f2 - place for improvement

reviews.text: Nevertheless there is place for improvement in several areas:
reviews.title: Another Great Trio

reviews.text: 1. No every other day maid service.This means no fresh towels, drinking water or trash disposal. Alberto the property manager was unavailable on the phone given in the contact sheet all through our stay but we did succeed eventually to get them to "clean" with the help of Jose one of the other maintenance personnel. The two cleaners finished "cleaning" in about 30 minutes but they did change the towels and disposed of the garbage.
reviews.title: Fabulous condo, beach and location

reviews.text: 2. The master bedroom is adequately furnished. The second bedroom had only one night lamp by the bed. We brought one more from the third bedroom. The third bedroom is not really usable, We did not need it - so no problem.
reviews.title: Early Spring Break

reviews.text: 3, The information given in the "what to do" file needs updating, e.g. the recommended spot "java joes" for breakfast closed down several years ago. Alberto's contact phone should be updated too.
reviews.title: Will never stay in a hotel in Playa again.

reviews.text: We just returned from a week at Luna Encantad-F2. We had a great week all round, and the condo worked out very well for us. The location can’t be beat, couldn’t be more convenient. There were 6 of us (family of 4 - adult kids, each brought a guest), so being able to stay in the same unit, with a kitchen and 2 bathrooms worked out perfectly. Also the complex isn’t huge, so it was quite peaceful. No swim-up bar (which we prefer), loud music at the pool, or struggle to get lounge chairs.
reviews.title: Had a great time!

reviews.text: As for the earlier comment on F2 regarding lack of housekeeping, etc., we did not have such a problem. Housekeeping was Mon-Wed-Fri as we were told. In addition to the general cleaning, they washed whatever dishes were left in the sink area, and did launder the bath towels and replaced the beach towels. As far as replacing water or other supplies (dishwasher soap, hand soap, etc) we did have to ask at the office, but they always took care of it. The office is closed on Sundays, so if you are running low on something, make sure you tell them Saturday.
reviews.title: Perfection
Excellent Stay - H2
reviews.text: The condo was for the most part comfortable. The exception would be the 3rd bedroom (smallest one). It was sparsely furnished and the ceiling fan made a clicking noise, so hard to sleep with it on. There is a/c throughout the unit, but this room was the only one without a thermostat and the a/c wasn’t blowing in that well. That along with no ceiling fan made the room a bit warm at night. Also, we did not have any noise issues (didn't hear music from Fusion next door).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did most of our grocery shopping at the Mega store and DAC market (on 30th av near calle 20). DAC has very fresh fruit and even fresh baked bread. They also serve breakfast and lunch and make great smoothies. Mega has just about everything else you will need. The take out bbq chicken on 20th Av and calle 2 is not to be missed. And leftovers along with some cheese make for some great homemade quesadillas the next day.
reviews.title: Best spot in Playa!
Best location in Playa!!!
reviews.text: We enjoyed sitting around the table on the terrace for lunch or an evening “cocktail” hour. The beach attendant, who we tipped a few dollars a day, was very helpful in setting us up with lounge chairs, umbrellas and tables. He even cut down some coconuts for us to drink the water (we tipped him extra for this!), which was quite the spectacle.

Just returned from a fabulous 10 night stay at Luna Encantada!! We stayed in the unit B3 the penthouse. This was our 4th annual trip to Playa and the Luna Encantada. Everything about this complex is first class. The service of the staff is top rate and every need is administered to on the spot. Sebastian who is the beach cabana boy is readily available to set up beach loungers and umbrellas as well as grabbing food and drinks from Fusion across the street. It's as simple as waking up in the morning and walking down 3 flights of stairs to a magnificent beach and escaping all the stresses of home life.
reviews.title: Playa Paradise!!!

reviews.text: We are currently in the process of making Luna Encantada a twice a year destination due to the experiences we've had the last 4 trips there. The location is the best in all of Playa, right in the heart of town and a stone's throw from the best boulevard in the world. There is never a dull moment walking down 5th Avenida in Playa del Carmen. The vibe of the town and the people is unparalleled. I recommend to anyone of any age to experience Luna Encantada and Playa del Carmen. The first time I went there 4 years ago my heart was won over and it gets better every time I go back. It changes the way I think about life in general. This place is a must!!!
reviews.title: If you want the best location in Playa, look no further

reviews.text: Just got back from a wonderful 2 week stay in Playa del Carmen (Christmas & New Year 2012) We stayed in Condo D1 and it was great. You will find it difficult to get a better location anywhere in Playa than this complex. Sitting right on the beach (no roads to cross) and 1 minute walk to 5th Ave.
reviews.title: Visit PDC the right way !

reviews.text: D1 is on the ground level, so no stairs or lift to worry about. Nothing to obstruct your 180 Deg view of the beach and 5 steps to the pool from the bedroom door.
reviews.title: Perfect choice, perfect vacation

reviews.text: We were a mixed family group of 5, ranging in age from 22 to 74. The place suited every one of us.
reviews.title: Luna Encantada H-2 Perfecto!

reviews.text: I have just returned from a weeks stay at Luna Encantada unit D3 it's one of the penthouses. Rented thru vrbo.com & also arranged private transfer to & from the airport with them. Definitely don't need a car. Anything you need is within easy walking distance otherwise, taxis are abundant & you can rent a car in playa for a day or longer if needed. Excellent value given it's ocean front location & a half block to 5th (main shopping street). The unit is nicely furnished & accommodated 2 of us with room to spare. It would certainly accommodate more people. This is a great place to stay & the staff is helpful. It's more private than a resort & you have a fully furnished kitchen if you choose to cook or just have snacks & beverages. The beds were a bit firm for our liking that's really the only negative I have.
reviews.title: Million dollar views & great location
A True Gem
reviews.text: I must admit I was a little nervous about this reservation because it was so inexpensive. Fortunately all of the fabulous reviews on TripAdvisor gave me confidence to book our stay. Our family usually stays in 4+/5 star resorts and condo D1 met and exceeded all expectations!

The location right on the beach and 1/2 block from 5th avenue was absolutely perfect! From the condo you could only see and hear the ocean and then you walk 1/2 block to the hustle and bustle of 5th avenue with open cafes/restaurants and live music. You do not need a car as you can walk or take a taxi everywhere. If you are looking to do an excursion, I would encourage you to book through the rental agency. Tello (from Carribean Properties) took us to Tulum and to/from the airport and he was great.
reviews.title: Wonderful home away from home

reviews.text: Unit D1 is in the perfect location, overlooking the beautiful beach so family members can be on the beach, in the ocean and on the balcony all within eyesight of each other. The pool is great and Adean who takes care of the beach chairs and any food/drink orders from Fusion is wonderful. Adean is not paid by Luna Encantada or Fusion, so be sure to tip him well.
reviews.title: This is my happy place

reviews.text: The unit is stocked with everything you could need; wifi, bottled water, tv, games, books, washer/dryer, beach towels, safe, 24hr security, etc. Maid service came every other day, which was perfect.
reviews.title: Excellent apartment hotel w. superb location

description: 24 luxury condos ideally located on the beach in the charming and bustling village of Playa del Carmen. Walk to everything from your vacation home by the sea. You'll make this vacation again and again.
